Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Effect.Activation

Class ProductionEffect

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Effect.Activation.ProductionEffect
All Implemented Interfaces:
Effect
public class ProductionEffect
extends java.lang.Object
implements Effect
ProductionEffect class represent the effect of production.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ProductionEffect​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resourceCost, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resourceAcquired)
    Construct a production effect with a specific production.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void attachMarket​(Market market)
    See Effect.attachMarket(Market).
    void attachResourceManager​(ResourceManager resourceManager)
    See Effect.attachResourceManager(ResourceManager).
    void doEffect​(PlayerState playerState)
    Checks if the player has enough resource for the production, if it does then pass all the resource that he will gain to the resource manager and it will handle those putting them into the strongbox, otherwise throws CantMakeProductionException.
    EffectData toEffectData()
    See Effect.toEffectData().

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductionEffect

      public ProductionEffect​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resourceCost, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resourceAcquired)
      Construct a production effect with a specific production.
      Parameters:
      resourceCost - the resources required for the production.
      resourceAcquired - the resources that the player will gain.

  • Method Details

    • doEffect

      public void doEffect​(PlayerState playerState) throws NotEnoughRequirementException
      Checks if the player has enough resource for the production, if it does then pass all the resource that he will gain to the resource manager and it will handle those putting them into the strongbox, otherwise throws CantMakeProductionException.
      Specified by:
      doEffect in interface Effect
      Parameters:
      playerState - the state of the turn, in this case must be of type PRODUCTION_STATE.
      Throws:
      NotEnoughRequirementException - if the player doesn't have enough card or resources to satisfy all requirements of the effect.

    • attachMarket

      public void attachMarket​(Market market)
      See Effect.attachMarket(Market).
      Specified by:
      attachMarket in interface Effect
      Parameters:
      market - the market of the game.

    • attachResourceManager

      public void attachResourceManager​(ResourceManager resourceManager)
      See Effect.attachResourceManager(ResourceManager).
      Specified by:
      attachResourceManager in interface Effect
      Parameters:
      resourceManager - the resource manager of the player.

    • toEffectData

      public EffectData toEffectData()
      See Effect.toEffectData().
      Specified by:
      toEffectData in interface Effect
      Returns:
      an EffectData based on the effect type and attributes.
